Settings.QueryText: SELECT CatalogNomenclature.Ref, CatalogNomenclature.DeletionMark, CatalogNomenclature.Parent, CatalogNomenclature.IsFolder, CatalogNomenclature.Code, CatalogNomenclature.Description, CatalogNomenclature.NomenclatureType, CatalogNomenclature.UnitOfMeasure, CatalogNomenclature.SKU, CatalogNomenclature.OrderCompletionTerm, CatalogNomenclature.BusinessActivity, CatalogNomenclature.VATRate, CatalogNomenclature.ReplenishTerm, CatalogNomenclature.DescriptionFull, CatalogNomenclature.Cell, CatalogNomenclature.UseBatches, CatalogNomenclature.ExpensesGLAccount, CatalogNomenclature.PriceGroup, CatalogNomenclature.Vendor, CatalogNomenclature.ReplenishMethod, CatalogNomenclature.Specification, CatalogNomenclature.Comment, CatalogNomenclature.NomenclatureGroup, CatalogNomenclature.WriteOffMethod, CatalogNomenclature.InventoryGLAccount, CatalogNomenclature.UseCharacteristics, CatalogNomenclature.Warehouse, CatalogNomenclature.Predefined, CatalogNomenclature.PredefinedDataName, ISNULL(InventoryOnHandBalance.QuantityBalance, 0) AS Quantity, InventoryOnHandBalance.BaseUnit AS BaseUnit, NomenclaturePricesSliceLast.Price, NomenclaturePricesSliceLast.Price AS PriceMin, NomenclaturePricesSliceLast.Price AS PriceMax FROM Catalog.Nomenclature AS CatalogNomenclature LEFT JOIN AccumulationRegister.InventoryOnHand.Balance AS InventoryOnHandBalance ON (&ShowQuantity) AND (InventoryOnHandBalance.Nomenclature = CatalogNomenclature.Ref) LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.NomenclaturePrices.SliceLast( , PricesKind = &PricesKind AND Actuality) AS NomenclaturePricesSliceLast ON (&ShowPrices) AND (NomenclaturePricesSliceLast.Nomenclature = CatalogNomenclature.Ref) WHERE CatalogNomenclature.IsFolder = FALSE
SELECT Nomenclature.Ref, Nomenclature.Description FROM Catalog.Nomenclature AS Nomenclature WHERE Nomenclature.IsFolder = TRUE
